content.title: AICTE- TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY JOINT TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR TEACHERS
content.beneficiary: Faculty members of AICTE approved institutions
content.details: AICTE- Technical University Joint Training Programs for Teachers aims to provide financial assistance to technical universities to conduct training for faculty members to improve teaching-learning methodology. The training program will be a six-day residential program with a minimum of forty participants.
benefits: Financial assistance for conducting training programs
eligibility: AICTE approved institutions affiliated with the partner university
documents_required: List of resource persons invited with full address, contact details, topics etc.
List of participants attended the training program
Copy of question paper and mark sheet for the test conducted at the end of program
Minimum five photographs and a video CD of selected sessions

faqs.question: What is AICTE-Technical University Joint Training Programs For Teachers scheme?
faqs.answer: AICTE – University training programs provides training for faculty members to prepare them for being successful in the chosen profession and thereby enabling an improvement in teaching learning methodology.

faqs.question: Who manages this scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme is managed by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE).

faqs.question: Mention one of the main benefits of the scheme.
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to the technical university for the training program.

faqs.question: What should be the criteria of the institution?
How many training program can be conducted by the universities?
faqs.answer: The university shall conduct 10 such training programs in a financial year.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the training program?
faqs.answer: The training program will be of six days.

faqs.question: How many minimum participants need to join this program?
faqs.answer: Minimum forty participants need to join.

faqs.question: Who will act as the facilitator for the operation of the training program?
faqs.answer: The university will act as the facilitator for the operation of the training program.
